page.title: 13Gloucester Rugby Union Club.
page.content: Gloucester R.F.C or the"{Cherry and {Whites"}was formed in 1873.It all started at a meeting at the Spread Eagle Hotel for the purpose of enrolling members of a football club. So it all began at the Spa Gloucester which was to be the first ground on which city rugby was played.After playing there for 18 years they moved to{Kingsholm. Some international teams who have played at Kingsholm are_Australia, Wales,NewZealand,Fiji and the multinational Barbarians. Gloucester has won the{John Player Cup twice.Here are some Gloucester players who have played for England_Peter Ford,Alan Brinn,Bill Hook,Malcolm Preedy,John Orwin,Mike Teague,Steve Mills and Phil Blakeway. {Kingsholm}is known all over the world as a famous centre for good rugby.
